00024 #ifndef BSA_BSA_FILE_H
00025 #define BSA_BSA_FILE_H
00026 
00027 #include <libs/mangle/stream/stream.hpp>
00028 #include <libs/platform/stdint.h>
00029 #include <libs/platform/strings.h>
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <vector>
00032 #include <map>
00033 
00034 namespace Bsa
00035 {
00036 
00040 class BSAFile
00041 {
00042  public:
00043 
00045   struct FileStruct
00046   {
00047     // File size and offset in file. We store the offset from the
00048     // beginning of the file, not the offset into the data buffer
00049     // (which is what is stored in the archive.)
00050     uint32_t fileSize, offset;
00051 
00052     // Zero-terminated file name
00053     char* name;
00054   };
00055 
00056   typedef std::vector<FileStruct> FileList;
00057 
00058  private:
00059 
00061   Mangle::Stream::StreamPtr input;
00062 
00064   FileList files;
00065 
00067   std::vector<char> stringBuf;
00068 
00070   bool isLoaded;
00071 
00073   std::string filename;
00074 
00076   struct iltstr
00077   {
00078     bool operator()(const char *s1, const char *s2) const
00079     { return strcasecmp(s1,s2) < 0; }
00080   };
00081 
00086   typedef std::map<const char*, int, iltstr> Lookup;
00087   Lookup lookup;
00088 
00090   void fail(const std::string &msg);
00091 
00093   void readHeader();
00094 
00096   int getIndex(const char *str);
00097 
00098  public:
00099 
00100   /* -----------------------------------
00101    * BSA management methods
00102    * -----------------------------------
00103    */
00104 
00105   BSAFile()
00106     : input(), isLoaded(false) {}
00107 
00109   void open(const std::string &file);
00110 
00114   void open(Mangle::Stream::StreamPtr inp, const std::string &name);
00115 
00116   /* -----------------------------------
00117    * Archive file routines
00118    * -----------------------------------
00119    */
00120 
00122   bool exists(const char *file) { return getIndex(file) != -1; }
00123 
00130   Mangle::Stream::StreamPtr getFile(const char *file);
00131 
00133   const FileList &getList() const
00134     { return files; }
00135 };
00136 
00137 }
